website_summaries.verdict: A 1-inch barbell at a great price.
pros: A chrome-plated 1-inch bar with a 250 pound capacity
A straightforward bar with light knurl marks
cons: The chrome may scratch and rust after several months

customer_reviews.title: Good bar, but not much length outside the collars
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 72" bar to upgrade from a 54" short bar, mainly because I could not fit more weights on that bar (but also because I couldn't properly position my hands on squats and bench press). Well, it's a very solid bar, but unfortunately the length of outside the collars is exactly the same as my short bar - about 11.25" on each side. I had assumed that some of the 18" difference would be outside the collars. So I guess I should have gotten the 7' bar, but this would be cumbersome in my workout space. So instead I need to upgrade from the bulky vinyl plates to thin iron plates.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: 49" Plate to Plate, "CAP Barbell 72" Standard Solid Threaded Bar, Chrome" (RB-72)
customer_reviews.text: Ordered "CAP Barbell 72" Standard Solid Threaded Bar, Chrome" (RB-72) 10/3/2020. The bar I received is 49" plate to plate. Deducting the small collars, it is about 48 and 1/8" between the collars. It fits my Progear1600 (rebranded Fitness Reality 810XLT) rack with inches to spare. Sleeves are 11.5". Non-gnurled middle section is around 14.6" It's what I would expect for a basic standard solid bar. Some bars in this price range are multi-piece and have a much lower maximum weight than the 250lbs this will hold. Needed it to do presses in a basement where a full size olympic bar had clearance issues.
customer_reviews.author: D. Saville

customer_reviews.title: Great  standard barbell bar!
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I choose the 72" over the 60". This bar is sturdy and fits all my standard (1") plates. The best part is it's a perfect fit for my racks. No spring locks were included but not a problem, I have a couple lying around waiting to be used.
customer_reviews.author: Luv4 USA

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: The barbell itself is great for the price they charge. I do have an issue with the packaging, as it was falling apart by the time it reached me. The barbell itself arrive scratched and chipped due to this. The barbell seems sturdy enough to hold upwards of 250 lbs. I feel that it could possibly hold 300, but I wouldn't count on it not bending. All things considered, I highly doubt you can find a barbell at this price range that would be better than this one. Perfect for the home gym enthusiast.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, great value
customer_reviews.text: Has very good knurling for the grip. I was able to deadlift nearly 300 with it and felt absolutely no sway in the bar. That's more than recommended but I assume that's to protect them. My guess is it could support 350-400 without much issue. Definitely a good purchase, considering I couldn't find a 2 inch bar for a reasonable price that would arrive this century....
customer_reviews.author: Jared Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Poor QC, sharp, lacking dimensions in product description.
customer_reviews.text: 72"x1" ends and 43" from shoulder to shoulder for the middle section. As in the inside of the weights are 43" apart. Lacking proper dimensions in description. It is also sharp as can be in the knurling, packaged oiled and plastic wrapped but I guess packaged for a long time because it has crud built up on it and has light surface rust. Possibly a victim of international shipping and no stateside QC. Other than that its a bar, actual 1.020"x14.5" on the end sections, and shoulders are 1.500".
customer_reviews.author: William_C

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I looovvee this! It's great value for the money! It's been on my wishlist for the longest time and I finally decided to get rid of my old one. I didnt experience any rusting, there was a oil residue but it came off quickly with a towel. I dont expect to ever lift over 200 pounds so I'm sure this will last me a very long time!
customer_reviews.author: IV

customer_reviews.title: Showed up rusty
customer_reviews.text: I paid $38 for this bar through amazon, very disappointing when i open a package to a very rusted bar. Again i paid $38 for this bar through amazon so beware of people re selling these as “collectibles “ for $199. Cap makes cheap products made in china, $38 price is on the high side. I will be returning this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a bar. It's fine. Definitely not threaded though.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not threaded, but that's fine. I saw in the pictures and some reviews that it wasn't threaded, which is just what I wanted, so just pay attention to that. Caps at 250lbs, but for home workouts while gyms are covid-closed, that's fine. I already had standard sized (1inch) plates so this works perfectly and it was in stock at the time. For the price, it's perfect. Mine was missing one of the rubber washers/gaskets, but probably easily replaceable and not 100% necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Gray

customer_reviews.title: Warped and not threaded
customer_reviews.text: Barbell ends are not threaded as advertised, and seem to be slightly warped. My 1" plates slid down about halfway down and then got stuck. I couldn't budge them, even with a hammer. Now I'm stuck with a barbell I can't return AND plates I can't use! Waste of money and time. UPDATE: Amazon has offered me a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: R. M.

customer_reviews.title: This is a Strong and Attractive Black Bar
customer_reviews.text: A word of caution: 1" clamps do not fit on the bar. It is thicker. It is a gorgeous and strong bar (the black color), the length is terrific too. Super power users will want olympic bars. For the rest of us, a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Carlsen

customer_reviews.title: Seems like great quality
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a sturdy well made 72" bar. Heavy too. Looking forward to using it. Not sure what all the negative reviews are about. I always wonder if they are just competitors leaving a bad review
customer_reviews.author: PNW Dood

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bar is straight. But, the knurl should start closer to the center of the bar to allow for closer grips. My hands slip on the bar when doing close grip bench press because there is no knurl.
customer_reviews.author: John A. Justin

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: The black finished bar seems to be of higher quality than the display models I've seen of the chrome plated ones. My only experience is with a vinyl, sand weight set kit bar, so my comparison is not very high to begin with, but overall this one seems well-built and strong.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Description is wrong, not threaded
customer_reviews.text: Longer than I wanted, but it was the only NON-THREADED I could find. Description says threaded, but it is not, and I didn’t want threaded, so it worked out for me. Very good product.
customer_reviews.author: G. Ruppert

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but some flaws
customer_reviews.text: Good bar. Sturdy for what I needed. The knurling is different on either side of the bar rather than uniform: one side is very aggressive requiring gloves for most and the other is lighter which would not. Additionally, missing a rubber gasket/washer on one side. Not enough to send back but annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon R. Baker

customer_reviews.title: No problem!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good size bar for squads, deadlifts! This is a good quality bar. I bought this one for my in home gym, just what I needed! Double check the inside circumference of the weights to match this 1"(inch) Bar!!
customer_reviews.author: Luis F

customer_reviews.title: Great bar for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's a good bar for the price. If I would change anything about it it would be that it would have rings to help measure distance when lifting. It's tough to measure where to put your hands because there are no rings. Otherwise this bar came as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Vjeko V.

customer_reviews.title: sizing
customer_reviews.text: This bar is great for it bang for buck value. Also feels heavy. Its about 49-50 inches from collar to collar measured from the inside.. and will fit a 4ft wide bench... although since it barely clears ... your plates might smack into the weight holder bracket... if you have room.. get the wider bar.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Nice bar, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Just as described in the picture. What you see is what you get. The price for this bar is great, I’m happy with the purchase. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: B.esco

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE - SMOOTH NOT THREADED
customer_reviews.text: Despite clearly stating in the listing that this is a threaded barbell, it is not. Smooth as glass, so you better have some clamp collars around if you intend to use this bar. Very disappointed in the misrepresentation of what the product actually is.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Sandifer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for small home gyms
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly good barbell for lighter weight lifters in small spaces. Its straight and sturdy and is appropriate for my small “home gym” space for lifts under 250lbs
customer_reviews.author: scotlynn carlson

customer_reviews.title: Not threaded
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is. However it's called "threaded" and one would assume that means it uses the "screw on" clips. However, it is not at all threaded so you need to also buy spring collars.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey A

customer_reviews.title: Slightly bent and sharp edges
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 60inch CAP barbell and it was great. Packaging was top quality, in a box, no damage. I bought a bigger bench so I needed a bigger bar and since I had success with the other CAP barbell, I tried to order the 72 inch. Package was just shrink wrap... Multi sharp edges and the bar was slightly bent. Returning item. I'll try again.
customer_reviews.author: SSTAKA

customer_reviews.title: It's a barbell
customer_reviews.text: It's a barbell, with no clamps. What more is there to say?
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great price with quick delivery
customer_reviews.text: Super happy to find a barbell at a reasonable price. It had a slight scuff mark on it...who cares its a barbell.
customer_reviews.author: lisa schultz

customer_reviews.title: Nice 1" starter bar
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for me. I'm 5'11" and 150 lbs. I suggest purchasing the "Akonza Adjustable Squat Rack" from Amazon if you will be using this to do squats. They fit perfectly together.
customer_reviews.author: John Alone

customer_reviews.title: Missing rubber ring like other people mentioned
customer_reviews.text: Received this bar as a gift and upon opening found the same issues previous reviewers had where one of the rubber rings was missing. Such a strange piece to be missing as the other one was in tact.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ghannam

customer_reviews.title: Great barbell to get back into lifting
customer_reviews.text: The bar itself is quite perfectly what I ordered and expected. The grip is perfectly placed on the bar. The only thing that bothered me was that one of the rubber pieces that goes in between the bar and weights was missing. Otherwise I love and would recommend this barbell; especially to those starting to lift again after not being able to for some time.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Morris

customer_reviews.title: Straightup Perfect Bar
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect 1" bar as far as I'm concerned. Don't forget to have your clips on standby or buy a set as the bar doesn't come with them. The quality of the bar has been very impressive so far.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bar
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a 1" bar that was 6 feet long and this fit the bill. Very nice sturdy bar.
customer_reviews.author: JohnA

customer_reviews.title: Great standard 6' barbell
customer_reviews.text: Perfect standard bar. 48" center from weight stop to weight stop. 11.5" end weight posts.
customer_reviews.author: Earthboy

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.text: Seems sturdy, I've been using it for about a month and have had no pieces flake or crack.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H Myers

customer_reviews.title: Worth getting
customer_reviews.text: Not real heavy which I like and worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Stacey M Toepfert

customer_reviews.title: It's not threaded and does not come with clasps/clamps, as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Love the weight, and length. Did not like that it was not threaded like it was supposed to be. Use it for bench press, military press, incline press, squats, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Big D

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bar, very fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bar, very fast shipping. I use this on a small bench with not very heavy weights. I use them to do a few workouts a week. Works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: MLea

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: No issues with chipping like others, holds >250 for my squat cage with little bend at all.
customer_reviews.author: jimrtmn

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have put up to the 250 pound limit on it and the bar held up. There was a slight bend in the bar but when the weights came off the bar looked straight.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Good for moderate use at home
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for a few weeks now almost daily with no major issues. Some of the finish was coming off of the grips but it looks like it was just excess, since I’m not seeing any bare metal parts. Also mine was missing one of the small rubber washers, but that’s not a huge deal. A good addition to a home gym overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive 72" barbell
customer_reviews.text: I paid for a 72" barbell and received a 59" barbell that does not fit my rack. Would give 0 stars if possible. This item is heavy and I will not pay shipping to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Hyatt

customer_reviews.title: this is a really good bare i love it
customer_reviews.text: its one of the best i have seen in a long time
customer_reviews.author: dylan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bar.
customer_reviews.text: I've loaded up to 250 lbs on this bar and it didn't bend a bit. Love the knurled grip that allows for a wide range of hand placements. I honestly have no idea how it could be improved.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Snow

customer_reviews.title: This is a good bar. In a time when so many bars ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good bar. In a time when so many bars are segmented, this is a full length bar. Quality is generally okay. I woudl buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Richard LeNoir

customer_reviews.title: Nice an wide!
customer_reviews.text: Read some of the reviews that were meh... and I am very happy when I got it home. Very sturdy and plenty wide for my weight rack!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what you would need in a 6 ft standard barbell. Heavy and good grip.c
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought a new bench and rack. The rack was too wide for my old bar. This one fits fine.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth R. Beamish

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a small room (have both 5' & 6')
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size (smaller room) and weight for a beginner like me. Easy to find good used prices on standard weights so fit my needs well. No issues with the bar at it's rated weight limit and I expect it to last for a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bar, fast ship!
customer_reviews.text: This bar allows me to have weights on the outside of the rack. I believe there is a 48” clearance in middle. Bar seems solid and already used it once with no problems. Fast ship also. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Very solid and good bar
customer_reviews.text: This bar is super solid; I currently have 150lbs on it and feels like it can take another 100lbs safely. I only gave it 4 stars because the barbell seems to be a little thin and my Cap standard collars fit loose. I am still very happy with this bar, but use gloves because the knurling is offensively sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Alex N.

customer_reviews.title: Solid Bar
customer_reviews.text: It was just delivered so I don't have too many miles on it and even though the rubber stops on the outside of the collars were loose and the package box was all bent up and mangled, it's still a solid bar with good grip.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Reimund

customer_reviews.title: Seems to me like it shouldn't be bowing
customer_reviews.text: Been using for a month now, already has developed a bow. I only ever put between 70 and 100lbs on it, never once had more than 100lbs loaded. Seems to me like it shouldn't be bowing. I'll still use it.
customer_reviews.author: mschapman7

customer_reviews.title: Not an easy thing to return either
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these bars and both of them were bent. Not an easy thing to return either.
customer_reviews.author: Smoke

customer_reviews.title: It holds weight while I lift it
customer_reviews.text: Hasn't rusted or anything yet. One rubber ring was broken on arrival, no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: stepheny fanning

customer_reviews.title: Great price. So far excellent
customer_reviews.text: Had it a few days. Great price. So far excellent. I use it without bar clamps. I put some tape on the ends to prevent the plates from slipping off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: This has proven to be an excellent purchase--high quality and you cannot beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Persing

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as described and fits my needs well. An excellent addition to my home gym.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Burby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Just fits between the uprights on my mid width bench. As others have said, it weighs 15 lbs. Wipe the oil off it before first use and you're good to go. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MT-400

customer_reviews.title: Honest
customer_reviews.text: It's a sturdy barbell. It does what it's supposed to, load weight. Good length and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage Spray Paint
customer_reviews.text: Straight garbage covered in rust, warped. Dont waist your money, spend more for quality product!
customer_reviews.author: matthew botruff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well along with my 5'. Mixing barbells up with different excercises keeps my workout fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Marq

customer_reviews.title: Good bar except missing rubber ring
customer_reviews.text: Bar came as described except it is missing the rubber O-ring on one side. Checked the box and nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bar!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much everything it's supposed to be. Nice grip, even weight. One small thing.. It came with some type of oil on it that caused me some skin irritation. I took some cleaner and wiped it down, no problems now! Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Denman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bar exactly what I was looking for, for my husband, straight 1 piece bar.....
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINA

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Only problem is it only came w one rubber ring for one side
customer_reviews.author: John Delta

customer_reviews.title: Great barbell
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected and fits my bench. Had to purchase this because last year I bought the same barbell but 5 feet long unfortunately but just be mindful of product dimensions lol
customer_reviews.author: Raydiate

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The barbell is just what I expected. It came in good condition and very fast shipping. If you are thinking about buying, go ahead and do it!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Not even close to 6'
customer_reviews.text: This barbell is far from 6'. It's MAYBE 5', but no where near 6'.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works fine but it's used
customer_reviews.text: So the bar has fine grip it's solid and fits the description but the one i got was clearly used and has surface rust.
customer_reviews.author: duckel

customer_reviews.title: Good 1” bar
customer_reviews.text: Got a used bar and it looks fine and works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good basic standard bar
customer_reviews.text: Its a good standard bar has fairly deep knurling and does what its made to do. The chrome could be better (scratches/marks in the center chrome area.
customer_reviews.author: flex

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bar, except it was missing one of the rubber grommets when delivered. Otherwise, we love it!
customer_reviews.author: BadlLil

customer_reviews.title: Solid chrome barbell
customer_reviews.text: The standard 6 foot barbell is really great for some of my clients who are not using the olympic bar. Another nice thing about this bar is that it can be used with my bench.
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice M.

customer_reviews.title: as advertised
customer_reviews.text: product was exactly as described and delivered in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: J Miller

customer_reviews.title: Barbell Bar
customer_reviews.text: This bar came exactly like described. I am very happy with it. The chrome seems to be of good quality so far.
customer_reviews.author: H. Joe Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy bar with some weight to it.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Lukens

customer_reviews.title: Happy buyer.
customer_reviews.text: The bar was exactly what I expected and has worked out great.
customer_reviews.author: J Carson

customer_reviews.title: Glad I got this bar to replace the cheap crap ...
customer_reviews.text: Glad I got this bar to replace the cheap crap one that came with the weight bench I bought for my son for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scraped and bent
customer_reviews.text: Product received was scraped and bent. Extremely disappointed in returning.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Zatell

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This was a great product and it was at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Jaye

customer_reviews.title: Thanks.
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what I want it thanks.and I like it that I get it earlier than I expected.Perfect for my workout.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Replaced with a better bar the day after I received it.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bar as a replacement to a 65-year old 5' bar I had been using for a while. The bar bent the first time using it, with only 100 pounds of weight loaded on it. I've already replaced it with a locally purchased Olympic bar.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: i ordered this product knowing cap was a good source. when my bar arrived it had possibly ...
customer_reviews.text: i needed a barbell for my standard weight plates. i ordered this product knowing cap was a good source. when my bar arrived it had possibly a 1" bow in it, to me this is defective. this is the very first bar i have purchased prebent. no feeling of security with this bar.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D. Sainz

customer_reviews.title: Good bar
customer_reviews.text: the bar is pretty long and its about 15 pounds and has nice gripping grid. Can handle a decent amount of weight with what I have, 350 pound. Make sure you buy some 1"inch clamps to go along with it. Easy to clean with disinfected wipes
customer_reviews.author: Just saying the truth, it's up to you to make a choice

customer_reviews.title: Broke dangerously during use
customer_reviews.text: One end of the barbell broke off after only 8 months of use. Very disappointing because my son saved for it for a while with his own money and it's not fixable. It also could've injured someone, but luckily didnt.
customer_reviews.author: Khadijah Cisse

customer_reviews.title: Not 1"
customer_reviews.text: Measured at 0.95" in diameter. Not compatible with any 1" clips, including the CAP branded 1" clips I have.
customer_reviews.author: Webster

customer_reviews.title: Great bar needs collars
customer_reviews.text: Would have given it 5 stars but I was under the impression it came with collars. Description did not say collars sold separately. So now I have a bar and weights and have to wait on collars.... The bar itself is absolutely solid. Love it. Fits my Golds Gym bench perfectly and is a helluva step up from the raggedy unsafe 2 piece bar that came with my bench. It was held together by rivets. Not even screws, literally aluminum plug rivets I had to hammer in and wouldn't trust to hold a pair of blue jeans together...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: worked perfectly with the plates i bought to do deadlifts
customer_reviews.author: K W

customer_reviews.title: To the bar!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bar. Thus far I've had 75lb on each side and have observed no bending, deformation or chipping.
customer_reviews.author: Metatron

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My bad, should have looked at picture better! No threads for plates!
customer_reviews.author: j r cready

product_meta.title: CAP Barbell 72" Standard Solid Threaded Bar, Multiple Colors
feature_bullets: CONSTRUCTION – This bar is 72 inches in length and made with solid steel and has a chromed finish. Made for standard 1 inch plates
FEATURES – This bar features end knurling for better grip and has a recommended weight capacity of 250 lbs

TRUST – Trust experience. CAP has been a pioneer in the fitness industry for over 30 years and has locations worldwide. Chances are if you have ever workout out, you have worked out with a CAP product

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
